src:
First official hands-on video for rugged Ulefone Armor 7 - Gizchina.com
06 Nov 2019, 19:02 by Ying Hua
Rate this post
From previous press releases we already know that Ulefone Armor 7 is the world’s 1st 48MP triple camera with Helio 90 flagship rugged phone. Now, it finally launched on the market and many customers are curious about its performance. To give customers a first glance at the new device before they receive it, Ulefone released a hands-on video to show their versatile flagship phone. So let’s go ahead and check out the video below.
Design-wise, the Ulefone Armor 7 adopts composite material back color with matte lustre, looks decent and upscale. Of course, it is backed by IP68/IP69K/MIL-STD-810G certifications and the video proves just that since it withstood sudden drops or water bath.



On the inside lies the flagship MediaTek Helio P90 8-core AI chipset and as seen in the video, watching YouTube, checking posts on Facebook, playing online game, chatting with friends on Messenger was a piece of cake for the device as everything ran smoothly. Also, the convenient heart rate detection is shown in the video, which is quite practical for sports enthusiasts.
As for the camera configurations, it features 48MP triple camera system with AI scene recognition, helps you effortlessly shoot photos that tell great stories, be your personal photography technique consultant. On the front, there is a 16MP sensor for beautiful selfie and it also supports face unlocking.The rest of the specs include 8GB RAM & 128GB flash memory, 6.3” FHD+ waterdrop screen, 5500mAh battery with Qi 10W wireless charging, face unlock & fingerprint ID, heart rate sensor, global frequency bands, NFC+Google Pay, Android 9.0 OS and more.
Since the device has already officially launch on the market, you can check all its details on official Ulefone website. And you can already order it from the Banggood e-shop for just $369.99 too. By the way, the grand 11.11 shopping carnival of Ulefone on AliExpress is coming, you will have chance to buy Ulefone phones with super low price, and there are giveaway and many coupons waiting for you.
